title: 5-year-old shot in face at NW Harris County home
content:
HARRIS COUNTY, TEXAS - Investigators are working to determine what led to a 5-year-old boy getting shot in the face Tuesday evening.
It occurred in the 9700 block of Shady Tree Lane near Fallbook Drive and Highway 249 in northwest Harris County. The boy’s parents rushed him to Willowbrook Methodist Hospital and he was later taken by Life Flight to Memorial Hermann Hospital in the Medical Center.
His condition was not immediately known as of Wednesday morning.
Investigators with the Harris County Sheriff's Office said the boy's mother was helping her father into bed when the boy and two others got into their uncle's room and found a gun. The gun was fired, and the boy was shot.
Investigators said it appears to be an accidental shooting but their investigation is ongoing.
